Art Exhibitions -- Lebanon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The flowers of street Mutanabi. Aref Rayess à la Galerie Contact, à partir 28 February 1973 : “Les Ouvrières corps” dont l’exposition “Les fleurs de la street Al-Moutanabbi = The flowers of street Mutanabi”.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Workers of the Body. | The Flowers of rue Mutanabi - off the Place of Martyrs
